1.text: And these are the kings of the land, whom the children of Israel smote, and of whose land they took possession across the Jordan, toward the sun-rising, from the river Arnon to mount Hermon, and all the plain on the east:

2.text: Sihon the king of the Amorites, who dwelt at Heshbon, [and] ruled from Aroer, which is upon the bank of the river Arnon, and from the middle of the ravine, and over half Gilead, as far as the river Jabbok, [which is] the border of the children of Ammon;

3.text: and the plain as far as the sea of Chinneroth on the east, and as far as the sea of the plain, the salt sea, on the east, toward Beth-jeshimoth; and on the south, under the slopes of Pisgah;

4.text: and the territory of Og the king of Bashan, of the residue of the giants, who dwelt at Ashtaroth and at Edrei,

5.text: and ruled over mount Hermon, and over Salcah, and over all Bashan, as far as the border of the Geshurites and the Maachathites, and [over] half Gilead [as far as] the border of Sihon the king of Heshbon.

6.text: Moses the servant of Jehovah and the children of Israel smote them, and Moses the servant of Jehovah gave it for a possession to the Reubenites, and to the Gadites, and to half the tribe of Manasseh.

7.text: And these are the kings of the land whom Joshua and the children of Israel smote on this side the Jordan on the west, from Baal-Gad in the valley of Lebanon as far as the smooth mountain, which rises toward Seir. And Joshua gave it to the tribes of Israel for a possession according to their divisions,

8.text: in the mountain, and in the lowland, and in the plain, and on the hill-slopes, and in the wilderness, and in the south: the Hittites, and the Amorites, and the Canaanites, the Perizzites, the Hivites and the Jebusites:

9.text: The king of Jericho, one; the king of Ai, which is beside Bethel, one;

10.text: the king of Jerusalem, one; the king of Hebron, one;

11.text: the king of Jarmuth, one; the king of Lachish, one;

12.text: the king of Eglon, one; the king of Gezer, one;

13.text: the king of Debir, one; the king of Geder, one;

14.text: the king of Hormah, one; the king of Arad, one;

15.text: the king of Libnah, one; the king of Adullam, one;

16.text: the king of Makkedah, one; the king of Bethel, one;

17.text: the king of Tappuah, one; the king of Hepher, one;

18.text: the king of Aphek, one; the king of Lasharon, one;

19.text: the king of Madon, one; the king of Hazor, one;

20.text: the king of Shimron-meron, one; the king of Achshaph, one;

21.text: the king of Taanach, one; the king of Megiddo, one;

22.text: the king of Kedesh, one; the king of Jokneam on Carmel, one;

23.text: the king of Dor in the upland of Dor, one; the king of Goim, at Gilgal, one;

24.text: the king of Tirzah, one: all the kings thirty and one.
